title: ProvenanceEnvelope
description: Provenance receipt embedded in rendered artifacts. Links a rendered output to its inputs for determinism verification and cache invalidation.

artifactHash.description: SHA-256 (hex) of the rendered artifact content

inputHash.description: SHA-256 (hex) of the combined inputs: graph snapshot + context + template

graphFrontier.description: Lamport tick frontier at render time, keyed by writerId

cacheKey.description: Opaque cache key for artifact reuse. Derived from inputHash + template version.

renderedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the artifact was rendered

resolvedContext.description: The context envelope used for this render
